pages.text: Armor pieces include several different tiers of $(l:combat/armors/helmet)helmets$(), $(l:combat/armors/chestplate)chestplates$(), $(l:combat/armors/leggings)leggings$(), and $(l:combat/armors/boot)boots$(), which can each be placed in designated armor slots of a player's inventory for use.

pages.title: Suit Up
pages.text: Protect yourself with a piece of iron armor. $(br2)Have any type of $(l:misc/iron_ingot)iron$() armor in your inventory.

pages.title: Cover Me With Diamonds
pages.text: Diamond armor saves lives. $(br2)Have any type of $(l:misc/diamond)diamond$() armor in your inventory.
